sentence.Network_en: A landowner who already holds land subject to a mortgage may wish to hypothecate his equity.
sentence.Network_cn: 已经拥有被按揭抵押土地的所有人可能会希望抵押他的衡平法权益.

sentence.Network_en: To pledge, hypothecate, sell of assign and otherwise encumber items as described above.
sentence.Network_cn: 抵押 、 担保 、 出售或转让及上面所列之其他项目.

sentence.Network_en: Just like hypothec and hypothecate, mortgage is corresponding newly emerging real right of pledge.
sentence.Network_cn: 按揭是与抵押权 、 质押权等相对应的一种新兴的担保物权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: hypothecarydebt 有抵押的债务, hypothecate 典押, hypothecate 不转移占有权地抵押
hypothecary 由抵押而获得的, hypothecate 不转移占有权地抵押, hypothecarydebt 有抵押的债务
On Competition and Shut of Hypothec and Hypothecate论抵押权与质押权的竞合

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin hypothecat- 'given as a pledge', from the verb hypothecare, based on Greek hupothēkē (see hypothec)

means.word_mean: 1. pledge without delivery or title of possession
2. to believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds;

sentences.sentence: "Scientists supposed that large dinosaurs lived in swamps"
